alert.note: Alert for Apache; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:24PM MST until July 11 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Apache County in northeastern Arizona... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 423 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Show Low, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Show Low, Wagon Wheel, Scott Reservoir Campground and Fool Hollow Lake Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 345 and 347. State Route 77 between mile markers 343 and 346. Highway 60 between mile markers 337 and 352. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
